conclusion: Identify relevant components: square wire frame and magnetic field.
Square wire frame with side length 0.2 m; half in magnetic field directed into paper; points a and b marked.
Magnetic field is perpendicular to paper and affects half of the square.
Increasing magnetic field induces EMF in wire frame.
EMF formula: EMF = -N (ΔΦ/Δt), with N = 1 for single loop.
Magnetic flux Φ = B A, where B is magnetic field strength and A is area affected.
Change in magnetic flux ΔΦ = 0.2 Wb.
Potential difference between points a and b is 0.2 V.
